title: Ability to control FM radio via APIs like we did in Silverlight for Windows Phone
body: With Silverlight in Windows Phone, i had the ability to use FM radio APIs.  In UWP, I cannot use these APIs as they weren't brought over.  I would greatly apperciate if these APIs could be added to UWP.

comments.body: I just do this using shared class library but unable to publish, because Microsoft says you are using unsupported API even if i am available package only for arm device, which is working fine in all arm devices which have fm radio hardware :(
I'd like to create a FM radio app, but the FM radio is currently not implemented (therefore not enumerable).
FM radio API is needed since default app was removed.
